titleStmt.title: Sir Barnaby Whigg, or, No wit like a womans a comedy : as it is acted by Their Majesties servants at the Theatre-Royal / written by Thomas Durfey, Gent.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Marmion, Shackerley, 1603-1639. Fine companion.
Brémond, Gabriel de. Double-cocu.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.G. and J.P. for Joseph Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Based on Marmion's A fine companion, and Brémond's Le double cocu. Cf. Baker, D.E. Biog. dram.
